TopicTitle: In case you have to leave a thread quickly and with style...

Articles.Content:
If you need to quit a thread quickly, you can always say: "I'm out of this"

But that doesn't have style.

If you need style, you need this:

(this is my gif, btw)

You can use it freely, of course.

This is now the official KSP forums Thread-Goodbye Maneuver !!!

If you want to be told off by sal_vager (or another moderator) for using reaction gifs*, use that!

Just a warning, please avoid reaction gifs if at all possible on the forums.

*or gifv, or webm...all the newfangled file formats

EDIT :

<---That's an avatar. Not a reaction gif. No, really. I guarantee it. Trust me on this. I'm the Doctor.
Yeah, this is a thing not to do. Unless you want to give us practice handing out infractions.
